Menopause is a natural part of female life that occurs twelve months after every woman's last period. This phase is characterized by a number of symptoms that can be extremely painful and frustrating. Some of the most concerning menopausal symptoms include night sweats hot flashes anxiety depression and vaginal dryness. The severity of these symptoms can vary to a great extent from woman to woman. In the worst cases the sufferers may experience these symptoms for the rest of their lives.
